Warranty & Support

If you’d like a copy of the manufacturer’s warranty for a product found on Amazon.com, you can contact the manufacturer directly or visit their website for more information. Manufacturer’s warranties may not apply in all cases, depending on factors like the use of the product, where the product was purchased, or who you purchased the product from. Price: $59.99 - $37.36
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:11:54 UTC – Details)


FH Group got you covered! Our premium cloth car seat covers not only provide the best protection for your car’s upholstery against any type of mess but they also enhance the looks of your car’s interior. No need to worry anymore about spills, stains, mud, or anything damaging your original car seats because this car seat protector got your back. Every car seat cover we make is built with high-quality, durable materials that will protect your car’s upholstery at all times. We offer automotive seat covers in numerous fabrics, colors, and designs, so you can easily find the seat cover for cars that fits your style the most. We have car seat covers for women, for men and for everyone. Our auto seat covers are compatible with most sedans, SUVs, and vansâ€™ front seats thanks to the universal low back seat cover design that delivers the snug fit you’re looking for, only if the front seatsâ€™ headrest is removable. Also, because safety is one of our main goals, this front set of cover for car seats is airbag compatible (officially tested!). We understand messes happen, thatâ€™s why these waterproof seat covers for cars are convenient for any type of driver. FH Group car seat covers are a great car interior accessory for your vehicle. We have it all: car seat covers for SUV, car seat covers for autos, car seat covers for vans, you name it!
[UNIVERSAL FIT] Our semi-customized car seat cover fits most vehicles better than other universal covers in the market. Our design has hook-and-loop attachments for a snug fit, straps in the bottom seat, and more, for an almost-customized look
[HIGH-QUALITY AND DURABLE MATERIALS] Our premium cloth car seat covers full set is built with 3 layers of cloth, 3mm padding and mesh fabric, making our covers a reliable and durable car seat protector.
[WASHABLE CAR SEAT COVERS] These carseat covers are machine washable! Simply remove the car seat cover, machine wash, and air dry.
[AIRBAG COMPATIBLE] Our front seat car seat covers feature a special stitching on the side allowing airbag deployment. Itâ€™s officially tested, making our covers a reliable car seat protector.
[FRONT SEAT STORAGE POCKET] The front bucket seat covers feature a handy map pocket on the back of the seat so you can store everything you need and have easy access to it.
[CUSTOMIZABLE REAR COVER] This cover is compatible with any split bench and becomes 2 individual covers with the extra mesh piece. This cover features zippers providing full access to the middle armrest. Elongate cover by adding an extra piece.
[AVAILABLE IN DIFFERENT COLORS] FH Group’s car seats come in 10 different colors, so you can perfectly match your car’s style and aesthetic.

Premium Seat Covers, Auto Accessories and More!

At FH Group we offer a wide variety of automotive products designed to make your life easier and more enjoyable.

Read more

Travel Master Series Seat Covers

Package Includes:

2 Front low back bucket covers.

1 Rear backrest cover.

1 Rear bottom bench cover.

5 Separate headrest covers.

1 Bag of snaps.

Combo packs will include additional products.

Works with Split Bench

Designed to fit 50/50, 40/60, 60/40, or 40/20/40 split rear benches

Travel Master Seat Covers

Available in several different colors. Fabric disperses heat to keep you cool and comfortable.

Premium Polyester Fabric

An eye-catching pattern adorns the center panel of this cover, adding a graceful touch to our high quality fabric.

Read more

Compatibility and Installation

Compatibility and Buying Tips

Due to installation requirement, please ensure your headrests can be detached before buying this set.This set is compatible with front side airbags and rear split function.

Dimensions

Semi-Universal to fit a wide range of cars, trucks, and SUVs.

Installation

Installation is simple with our easy instruction videos available on our website. This product is only compatible with vehicles that have detachable or adjustable headrests.

Product Features:

  • Airbag compatible – special stitching on the side allows airbag deployment. Officially tested!
  • Designed to fit 50/50, 40/60, 60/40, or 40/20/40 split rear benches
  • Semi-customized to fit most vehicles. Will not interfere with heated seats.

Read more



Unique Flat Cloth Seat Covers Complete Set For Most Sedans, SUVs, and Trucks
Highback Style Neoprene Full Set Airbag Safe
Raised Edge Multi-Use Cargo Tray For Home and Auto
FH Group Textured Grip Steering Wheel Cover
Style: Flat Cloth Pattern. Neoprene Highback. Cargo Tray. Textured Grip Steering Wheel Cover.
Feature: Our high quality fabric with 3mm of breathable foam backing is soft to the touch and disperses heat, keeping you comfortable and cool on even the hottest summer days. These neoprene seat covers are waterproof, stain proof, and life proof to protect you from all kinds of disasters. Waterproof Neoprene with Non-Slip Backing. Rear seat cover designed to accommodate 50/50, 40/60, 60/40, and 40/20/40 split benches. Our premium all-weather cargo tray will deliver the ultimate protection for your trunk. Heavy duty rubber material protects your trunk against spills and messy cargo and a specially finished surface keeps your haul from shifting around. Is your steering wheel starting to fade and wear, direct sunlight and hot temperatures can damage car interiors. The FH Group Steering Wheel Cover is designed to protect your steering wheel, while adding a touch of class to your ride.
Package Included: 2 front low back bucket covers 1 rear backrest cover 1 rear bottom bench cover 4 separate headrest covers 1 bag of snaps. 2 bucket seat covers, 1 rear bench backrest cover, 1 rear bench bottom seat cover, 3 headrest covers. 1 Raised Edge Cargo Tray for Home and Auto. 1 Steering Wheel Cover.
Dimension: Semi-Universal. Semi-Universal. Available in 32″ and 40″ Sizes. Stretchable Silicone fits all vehicles from small sedans to Trucks and SUVs.
Cleaning Tips: Wipe Clean for best results use microfiber cloth. Wipe Clean for best results use microfiber cloth. Vaccuum or use soap and water. Air dry. Wipe Clean for best results use microfiber cloth.
Installation Tips: Helpful installation videos are available after purchase. Helpful installation videos are available after purchase. Simply place wherever needed! No installation Required. Easily slides over steering wheel.

About Us

FH Group International, Inc. is a manufacturer you can depend on and trust. Our mission is to exceed your expectations by providing a large selection of outstanding car accessories at affordable prices. We are constantly striving to provide our customers with the most efficient and friendly communications, smooth transactions, and speedy deliveries.

At FH Group International, Inc., we offer a variety of car accessories such as high quality seat covers and car covers for most makes and models on the market, protective floor mats, genuine leather steering wheel covers, and much, much more.

Product Description

Great For Garden Use

For gardeners, plants and vegetables are very important to them.

Especially during bad weather with strong wind and snow, you should need garden fabric (such as row cover or plant cover, or shade cloth), but the good garden clips are also a necessary part of your garden, they can fix the garden fabric in place to extend the growing season.

Beside garden clips, they also can be great food bag closure clips, clothespins, binder clips, photo clips, beach towel clips, etc.

We are sure they will become ideal accessories for you.

About Samhopo

Samhopo means “hopes”, which is also the name of a remote village.

The founder is coming from this very poor and backward place. She is eager to do something to help the people get out of there and have a better life, so there is “Samhopo”

The purpose of the brand is to sell affordable products all around the world to help people live more conveniently.

Large Open Heavy Duty Greenhouse Clips

Feature

Material: stainless steelï¼ˆNote: the spring part is not stainless steel.ï¼‰

Length:approx. 2 inch

Width: approx. 1.1 inch

Single clip weight: approx. 0.2 ounce

Package includes:40 x Greenhouse Clips

Have a strong grip Good spring action Sturdy and durable. Smooth edges Easy to Use

MULTI-USE Garden Clips

They will be helpful to anyone who wants them for garden use

Suitable for many hoops of different thickness.

Diameter in closed state approx 3/8â€

Maximum diameter in open state approx 3/4â€

can be adapted to many different sizes of poles,hoops,stands or pipes.

Why choose our Greenhouse Clamps

Note

Please be concerned about the size before you buy.

Please allow slight size errors due to manual measurement.

GOOD SPRING ACTION: Samhopo garden clips has a thick spring, which has good spring action and can be adapted to most different sizes of garden hoops, stands, pipe or poles. Easy to open and strong. These greenhouse clamps have a strong grip and will not disintegrate like plastic.
MULTI-USE PRODUCT: These greenhouse clips are strong enough to hold down the netting on your raised garden beds or row cover on your garden hoops when it’s a windy day. They will be helpful to anyone who wants them for garden use. Aside from garden use, they make great food bag closure clips, clothespins, binder clips, photo clips, cord clips for hanging up string lights, etc.
SUITABLE FOR MANY HOOPS OF DIFFERENT THICKNESSES: These garden clips have good spring action and strong grip, Diameter in closed state approx 0.36 inches, Maximum diameter in open state approx 0.8 inches, Can be adapted to many different sizes of greenhouse hoops, poles, pipe or stands.
DURABLE MATERIAL: These greenhouse clamps are made of stainless steel(Note: The spring part is not stainless steel), sturdy and durable. They are more durable than wood clips or plastic clips. The clips snapped on easily and held the frost blankets and greenhouse cover in place through high winds and heavy snow.
PACKAGE INCLUDES: 40pcs stainless steel greenhouse clips. Size of the clamp: Length approx. 2 inches, Width approx. 1.1 inches, Single clip weight 0.2 ounce. Please be concerned about the size before you buy.

Great For Garden Use

From the brand

Xindell was established in 2016, focusing on the cleaning and maintenance of car windshields, and has professional and meticulous car care products and services, OEM car replacement parts.

Xindell Windshield Cleaner ensure that apart from online avenue, we have a strategic location, investing in state-of-the-art equipment and excellent friendly staff.

What Makes Our Products Unique?

a)Fast and Easy to Cleaning Auto Windshield

b)Get to the hard-to-reach area of vehicle windshield pretty well

c)Car windshield cleaning kit designed with 180Â°swiveled triangular head to make a complete contact to the glass

d)Fit with the glass surface very well

e)Multiple Uses

f)Anti-skid & Durable

How to Clean Inside Car Windows?

Spray your preferred brand of glass cleaner on the microfiber cleaning cloth and wipe down the inside of the windshield. This should remove what did not come off with just the microfiber cloth.

SHOP XINDELL STORE

Fast and Easy to Cleaning Auto Windshield: Most used to dread cleaning their car mainly because of that it was a big hassle to clean the windshield. Not anymore! Clean car window interiors and exteriors. No more hurting your back. The windshield cleaner is designed with the Extra Long extension handle and pivoting head getting to those hard-to-reach car window bases is simple. XINDELL windshield cleaning tool can remove more dirt and dust, easy to clean the hard-to-reach areas effortlessly.
Helps get the hard-to-reach area of vehicle windshield pretty well! Car windshield cleaning kit designed with 180Â°swiveled triangular head to make a complete contact to the glass, which fit with the glass surface very well, easy to clean the bottom of car windows or some hard-to-reach areas, from interior to exterior, easy to use and effortless. Long ergonomic handle, easily extend to hard-to-reach window bases, leaving surfaces for even cleaning.
Multiple Uses: Works great as a fog & moisture removal tool. Easy windshield cleaner is safe to use on all surfaces and wonâ€™t scratch, ideal for interior & exterior cleaning, great for cars, such as trucks, SUVs and recreational vehicles of all sizes. The EASY windshield cleaning brush tool also are suitable for kitchens, bathrooms, furniture, mirrors, ceramic, shower stalls and other household needs! Also ideal for de-misting your windscreen in winter. No need to wait your vehicle warm up.
Anti-skid & Durable: The cleaning pad pole use aluminum alloy material, lightweight and wonâ€™t rust, more durable than plastic one, the end of the handle is with soft sponge, non-slip and comfortable to hold. 3 pcs Washable & Reusable Pads made of fine fiber fluffed material, can remove more dirt and dust, easy to clean, which helps keep it effective. The microfiber cloth helps to remove dirt, dust, and fingerprints on the glass. Great Design Car Window Cleaner!
Special Instructions: â—Interior Windshield Cleaning: Can be used dry pad or spray a small amount of water on the pad and wipe clean. Refrain from drenching the surface or smudges will appear. â—Exterior Windshield Cleaning: Can be used dry pad. â—Fog Removal: simply wipe glass with no added water or liquid chemical. â—Stubborn stains on the glass: Can be spray a little Glass Cleaning Fluid for wiping. â—No chemical or soap is needed to clean the surface, just a little water.

XINDELL UPGRADE WINDSHIELD CLEANING TOOL

The ultimate design goal of XINDELL windshield cleaner is to easily clean the car.

  • Is it hard for you to clean the whole of your car’s windscreen?
  • Does dirty windshield annoy you?
  • Is it always fog and moisture?
  • No longer worry about that as XINDELL windshield cleaner tool can be your good partner to clean your car windshield at ease.

Read more

The windshield cleaning tool can remove dust ,dirt and fingerprints on the glass, easy to clean the hard-to-reach areas.

-Ergonomic Design

–

  • The windshield cleaner with the long extendable handle and pivoting head easily reach into the driver and passenger side corner and other angles.
  • The windshield cleaner with the long extendable handle and pivoting head easily reach into the driver and passenger side corner and other angles.

– Product Instructions

–

  • When you clean the windshield: you can use a dry pad to wipe the dust; You also can spray slight water or glass cleaning liquid on the pad to wipe the stubborn stains. Don’t wet the cloth completely.
  • Remove the mist from the internal windshield: you can directly use our window brush to wipe it.
  • No chemicals or soap are needed to clean the pads, just water.

-Replaceable windshield brush pads

–

  • Made of microfiber material can remove more dust and dirt, easy to clean, washable, and reusable.
  • The Windshield Cleaning Tool Kit includes:
  • 1 * Car Windshield Cleaner
  • 3 * Microfiber Bonnets
  • 1 * Empty Spray Bottle

JUSTTOP Windshield Cleaning Tool, Car Window Cleaner with Unbreakable Extendable Long-Reach Handle and Washable Reusable Microfiber Cloth, Car Exterior Accessories, Green
Extendable Handle: The extendable handle not only contains the soft sponge cover to ensure your comfort when cleaning the window; but also the adjustable length of the handle also makes it easier to clean the vehicle glass. The handle is 9.45-15.35 inch and whole cleaner is 10.83-16.73 inch, which is long enough to allow you to clean any position of the car glass.
180Â°Swiveled Triangular Head: Designed with pivoting Square head to make a complete contact to the glass, which can be rotated 180 degrees to fit the glass surface very well, easy to clean the bottom of car windows or some hard-to-reach areas, easy to use and effortless.
Removable Microfiber Cloth Pads: The car window cleaner includes 3 pieces of microfiber pads for easy replacement, wet and dry use. The towel is made of soft microfiber and the surface of the fabric is finely treated , which must clean your vehicle well and never cause streaking after cleaning.
Wide Application: The windshield cleaner is great for all size cars, SUV, trucks, Jeeps, UTVs, ATVs and so on. You can also used for cleaning house, include windows, television, monitor, kitchen walls, bathrooms mirrors, even tables and floors at home.
Easy Use: Simply slip one of the microfiber cloth cover on the head, spray with water, and start washing.
